name: Oracle Lens

active.effects: Consume one charge to summon a {{tip|Sweeper Drone}} that escorts you for the next 8 seconds, detecting nearby enemies that are not {{tip|sight|visible}}.

effects_structured.raw: Consume one charge to summon a {{tip|Sweeper Drone}} that escorts you for the next 8 seconds, detecting nearby enemies that are not {{tip|sight|visible}}.

simpleDescription: Disables nearby invisible wards and traps for a duration
